name: Mist of Stagnation - A FPS/RTS hybrid in a Steampunk world
blurb: A multiplayer RTS/FPS in a Steampunk setting.  Mechs, awesome weapons, colorful characters and beautiful environments await you.

rewards.reward: Airship Pirate (LIMITED) - To our biggest fans, you got here early and got the game for $15. THANK YOU!\r\n\r\nA digital copy of the game upon release.
Airship Pirate Tier - Get a digital copy of Mist of Stagnation.  This time, its good to be a pirate!
Audiotorian Tier - Get a digital copy of Mist of Stagnation + a download link to the musical soundtrack.  Multiple composers around the world have been working on this.

Early Bird Tier - Get into the game early.  Join us in testing the game as soon as the Kickstarter campaign is over + a digital copy of Mist of Stagnation when it releases + a download link for the soundtrack.

The Collectors Tier - For a $65 pledge, you will be the proud new owner of a physical copy of Mist of Stagnation when it is released.  You will also receive a CD with the soundtrack on it, and a custom print made only for this tier.
Master Elect of Four Tier - 4 digital copies of Mist of Stagnation to share with your friends.

Gentleman Caller Tier - Look your best in a Mist of Stagnation shirt that you will receive in this tier + a digital copy of Mist of Stagnation when it releases + a download link to the soundtrack + BETA access.\r\n\r\n---Physical rewards will be shipped in March---

Æther Mechanic Tier - Turn water to fire!  You have unlocked the secrets of the elements.  Well not really, but you have replaced the tank on your boiler maker with this flammable concoction.  

Get a limited edition Flame Thrower Boilermaker + a limited edition in game Flame Thrower avatar +  Beta Access + digital copy of Mist of Stagnation when it releases + a download link to the soundtrack.

---In game rewards will be given at launch---

Brass Balls Tier - A special Kickstarter only taunt.  For $250 you will unlock a special taunt for all characters.  Let them know who's boss with this... jester. Lets your friends in the real world know about them too with the Mist of Stagnation Brass Balls Trucker Hat & Shirt.

You get the KS exclusive "Brass Balls" taunt +  "I've got brass balls" Shirt & Trucker Hat + Beta Access + digital copy of Mist of Stagnation when it releases + a download link to the soundtrack.  Do you have Brass Balls?                Once this one is gone, that's it forever!

---Physical rewards will be shipped in March---
---In game rewards will be given at launch---

Airship Captain Tier - You will be known on all battlefields as a supporter of Mist of Stagnation.  Get a special in game emblem to show off. This tier also unlocks some cool swag.  In addition to Beta Access + digital copy of Mist of Stagnation when it releases + a download link to the soundtrack, you also get a Mist of Stagnation shirt, and banner.  Similar to the ones used at PAX Prime. This tier also unlocks the 3" Commander 3D Printed sculpture.

---Physical rewards will be shipped in March---
---In game rewards will be given at launch---

Master & Commander Tier - Be the Master of your own Mist of Stagnation 32 player server for a full year. You also get 4 digital copies of the game to give our to your minions to join you.  This tier also gets the 6" Commander 3D printed sculpture + special KS in game emblem to show off 

You will also receive 4 Beta keys to help us with testing too, along with being listed on our website and in the credits as Master & Commander.

---Physical rewards will be shipped in March---

Clan Wars Tier - Work with our artists to create a  sign, building, statue or other landmark in game, for your clan.  True bragging rights and territory domination. (Final Art and placement pending approval).  This tier also gets your clan 10 digital copies of Mist of Stagnation + special KS in game emblem to show off + Beta Access for your Clan. (up to 10 codes)

Blackfinger Tier - Work with our artists and create a character or weapon for Mist of Stagnation. Work with our art team through all of the steps from concept to animation of your creation. You will also receive a 6" 3D printed statue of your creation.  (Pending approval, must fit theme).\r\n\r\nIn addition to this, you also unlock the Airship Captain Tier.

Honorary 33° Tier -  Join us as our guest at PAX East 2014.  We will fly you out, provide you with a hotel, tickets to the event, our event shirt and swag for that year.  Hang out with the team that is making Mist of Stagnation for an entire week in Boston.  We will make sure you are having a great time as we show off the latest and greatest from Osiris Studios LLC.  Get listed in the Credits as an Honorary 33° supporter.  Have your likeness created into a character in the world, with a custom weapon made for you, then receive a 6" 3D printed model of it to hold onto forever! You will also have a custom art piece made with you in true steampunk fashion, in the world of Mist of Stagnation, printed on a 24" x 36" canvas.

Get all items from the Airship Captain Tier and 10 digital copies of the game to do with as you please.

Travel arrangements only available to North American residents.
